trans-unit.source: Provides custom binding management for components.
trans-unit.target: Fornece gerenciamento de associação personalizada para componentes.

trans-unit.source: This interface allows component authors to provide their own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for components that will interact with the Windows Forms data-binding engine.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface permite que os autores do componente fornecer suas próprias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>para componentes que irão interagir com o mecanismo de associação de dados do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: It is rare for a component author to need to implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: É raro para um autor de componente necessário para implementar esta interface.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class provides an example implementation of ICurrencyManagerProvider.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>classe fornece um exemplo de implementação de ICurrencyManagerProvider.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: Note that for Smartphone applications, this class requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones.
trans-unit.target: Observe que, para aplicativos de Smartphone, essa classe requer software Windows Mobile versão 5.0 para Smartphones.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider"></xref> and the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider"> </xref> e o membro de dados especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `dataMember` is `null` or an empty string (""), GetRelatedCurrencyManager returns the main currency manager for this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>, which is the same currency manager returned from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider.CurrencyManager%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se `dataMember` é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), GetRelatedCurrencyManager retorna o Gerenciador de moeda principal para este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>, que é o mesmo Gerenciador de moeda retornado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider.CurrencyManager%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider.CurrencyManager%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>

trans-unit.source: The name of the column or list, within the data source, to obtain the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: O nome da coluna ou lista, na fonte de dados, para obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> para.

trans-unit.source: The related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> obtained from this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider"></xref> and the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: Relacionado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> obtido isso <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider"> </xref> e o membro de dados especificado.
